content: For anyone interested, who'll be at HIMSS in February, I'll be meeting with DirectTrust to discuss the relationship between Direct and FHIR (both community and technical specs)

Some of you might have seen this:
https://www.directtrust.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/Direct-FHIR-Whitepaper_vers_1.4_08102017.pdf

and also there's this:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Sending_FHIR_resources_in_Direct_Messages
